General.Name: Straightup Resources Inc
General.Description: Straightup Resources Inc. acquires and explores for mineral properties in Canada. It explores for gold, copper, and lithium. The company holds an 100% interest in the Belanger Project comprising the RLX North, RLX South, and Belanger properties located in the District of Red Lake, Ontario; and the Opatica Lithium project located in the James Bay region of Quebec. Straightup Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Sechelt, Canada.
General.Address: #207 - 5500 Warf Ave., Sechelt, BC, Canada, V0N 3A0
